oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Construction News article on Memphis public works project
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: infrastructure; Jefferson Avenue; streets; construction; magazines;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The cover story of the Public Works Issue of Construction News magazine from August 30, 1967, is about an innovative overpass in Memphis at Jefferson and Danny Thomas Blvd. From Vol. 34, No. 35. Cover and pages 10 through 12.
